messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_TiledKSampler?
The ComfyUI_TiledKSampler allows for denoising larger images by splitting it up into smaller tiles and denoising these.
How does the random tiling strategy reduce seams?
The random tiling strategy randomizes the tile positions for each step of denoising, reducing the visibility of seams.
What is the disadvantage of the random strict tiling strategy?
The random strict tiling strategy can unfavorably crop border tiles.
How does the padded tiling strategy reduce seams?
The padded tiling strategy provides additional context to each tile through padding, reducing seam visibility.
Which tiling strategy is compatible with uni samplers?
The padded tiling strategy is compatible with uni samplers.
What are the planned future developments for the ComfyUI_TiledKSampler?
Future developments include latent masks, image-wide control nets, and tile-wide control nets.
